price: Hakika wale walioko kwa Mola wako Mlezi hawajivuni wakaacha kumuabdu, na wanamtakasa na wanamsujudia
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَيُسَبِّحُونَهُۥ وَلَهُۥ يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩
footnotes: Hao walio karibu na Mola wako Mlezi kwa utukufu na takrimu hawatakabari wakaacha kumuabudu. Na wanamtakasa Mwenyezi Mungu na kila lisio faa kwake. Na wanamnyenyekea Yeye.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ʿinda rabbika lā yastakbirūna ʿan ʿibādatihi wayusabbiḥūnahu walahu yasjudūna
